description: The CPU load on one of the processor modules is excessive. The
current value of the one minute load on the CPU module
that is experinceing excessive load is sent.

event.Summary: Excessive CPU load on processor module

description: The average number of processes ready to run in the last
minute.
variables.name: CBS-MODULE-RESOURCES-MIB::cbsModuleCPULoad1

description: The CPU load on one of the processor modules has returned to
normal. The current value of the one minute load on the CPU module
that has returned to normal is sent.

event.Summary: CPU load on processor module is normal

description: The average number of processes ready to run in the last
minute.
variables.name: CBS-MODULE-RESOURCES-MIB::cbsModuleCPULoad1

description: The memory usage on the processor modules is excessive. The
current values of total and free memory for the module are
sent.

event.Summary: Excessive memory usage on processor module

description: Total memory that can be utilized by the operating system.
variables.name: CBS-MODULE-RESOURCES-MIB::cbsModuleMemoryTotal

description: The amount of memory in use.
variables.name: CBS-MODULE-RESOURCES-MIB::cbsModuleMemoryUsed

description: The memory usage on the processor modules that was excessive
has returned to normal. The current values of total and free
memory for the module are sent.

event.Summary: Memory usage on processor module is normal

description: Total memory that can be utilized by the operating system.
variables.name: CBS-MODULE-RESOURCES-MIB::cbsModuleMemoryTotal

description: The amount of memory in use.
variables.name: CBS-MODULE-RESOURCES-MIB::cbsModuleMemoryUsed

description: The CPU utilization on one of the processor modules is excessive. The
current value of the one minute utilization on the CPU module
that is experinceing excessive load is sent.

event.Summary: Excessive CPU utilization on processor module

description: CPU utilization averaged over last 1 minute.
variables.name: CBS-MODULE-RESOURCES-MIB::cbsModuleCPUUtil1

description: The CPU utilization on one of the processor modules has returned to
normal. The current value of the one minute utilization on the CPU module
that has returned to normal is sent.

event.Summary: CPU utilization on processor module is normal

description: CPU utilization averaged over last 1 minute.
variables.name: CBS-MODULE-RESOURCES-MIB::cbsModuleCPUUtil1
